content:
You are Melius Engine, an autonomous AI agent. 
        Current Event/Request from event.json: mordenui-egypt-lightcolour-desert-mobileresponsive-clean
        
        Repository files: ['LICENSE', 'README.md', 'event.json', 'DESIGN.md', 'test-website/styles.css', 'test-website/index.html', 'test-website/script.js', 'test-website/package.json', 'test-website/vercel.json', 'docs/styles.css', 'docs/.nojekyll', 'docs/index.html', 'docs/script.js', 'github-page/styles.css', 'github-page/index.html', 'github-page/script.js']
        Existing To-Dos: [{'file': 'test-website/styles.css', 'pending': 'Fix the SVG data URL to include proper SVG content for Egyptian-themed patterns.'}, {'file': 'test-website/script.js', 'pending': 'The script.js file needs to be updated with the improved mobile menu toggle functionality as described in the intent.'}, {'file': 'test-website/script.js', 'pending': "Fix the syntax error by removing the word 'pełni' and re-implement the mobile menu toggle functionality with proper event handling, smooth transitions, and user-friendly interactions as described in the intent"}, {'file': 'test-website/client/src/App.tsx', 'pending': "Add Link imports from 'wouter' for navigation elements"}, {'file': 'test-website/client/src/App.tsx', 'pending': 'Add useState hook to manage mobile menu state'}, {'file': 'test-website/index.html', 'pending': 'Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.'}, {'file': 'test-website/styles.css', 'pending': 'The CSS file needs to be updated with Egyptian-themed color palette and UI elements as described in the intent.'}]
        Existing Errors: []

        CONSTRAINTS:
        1. You can ONLY modify UI-related files (CSS, TSX components, basic UI theme).
        2. DO NOT modify build files, configurations, or dependencies (vercel.json, package.json, vite.config.ts, etc.).
        3. Do not ask to re-read files if they are already in the context.
        4. Focus exclusively on UI theme changes based on the event: mordenui-egypt-lightcolour-desert-mobileresponsive-clean.
        
        Analyze the project and suggest UI/Theme improvements. 
        If you need to read specific files, list them in "files_to_read".
        
        
CRITICAL:
Return JSON in this exact format:

{
  "files_to_read": [],
  "analysis": "string",
  "improvements": [
    {
      "file": "relative/path.tsx",
      "description": "precise UI change"
    }
  ]
}

Do NOT add extra keys.
Do NOT nest improvements.
Do NOT return prose outside JSON.

Modify UI for: test-website/styles.css Description: Update the CSS file with Egyptian-themed colors (sandy beige, gold, deep blue) and UI elements like patterns inspired by ancient Egyptian art. Event: mordenui-egypt-lightcolour-desert-mobileresponsive-clean Context: {'test-website/index.html': ' Marcus Aurelius | Philosopher King
  • Home
  • About
  • Reflection
  • Why Philosopher King

Roman Emperor • Stoic Thinker

Marcus Aurelius

A Philosopher King who ruled with discipline, duty, and reason.

🔺
🔺
🔺
🀄
👤
Welcome to the Wisdom of Ancient Egypt
🀄
🀄
🀄
🀄
🀄

Who was Marcus Aurelius?

Marcus Aurelius Antoninus (121–180 CE) was Roman emperor from 161 to 180 CE and is often remembered as history's clearest example of a philosopher king. While leading campaigns and governing a vast empire, he wrote private notes on character, mortality, and responsibility.

Reflection from Stoicism

"You have power over your mind — not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength."

Why "Philosopher King" fits

  • Duty over comfort: He treated power as service, not privilege.
  • Reason over impulse: He practiced self-command in public life.
  • Virtue over fame: His writings focus on integrity, not applause.

Simple HTML + CSS + JavaScript tribute page.
